file_content.text: Those Esh-kha are waking up to a very different galaxy. I hope they can adapt.
These, er, "Noetikons" sound fascinating, Jedi. You must tell me all about them later.
My stupidity almost cost our royal family's lives.
Our king and queen. What have I done?
Don't underestimate those pirates, Jedi, only survivors last long on Hoth.
Nadia's gifts have been... challenging for us. I do hope you understand why I kept them secret.
If Nadia's determined to go with you to Attis Station, please, take care of her.
Even if you succeed, poor Tai still has to put Balmorra back together.
We'd all have been lost without your bravery. Thank you, Jedi, a thousand times.
This marvelous galaxy of yours makes me feel very small.
